resources.string: The purpose of this app is to reunite lost animals with their owners, warn people of potentially dangerous animals, and share findings of wildlife with other curious humans!

A lost pet can wreak havoc on ecosystems it is not native too, spread diseases to wildlife and humans alike, hurt tourism, shake housing markets, and this is all not to mention the emotional toll of losing a pet.

Cats left to roam outside are responsible for the extinction of 63 species of birds.

In 2017 there were between 30-40 million stray cats in the United States.

Every year around 10 million domestic animals are lost in the United States.
Nothing posted yet, check back later!
